answers.lua_do:
function lua_do()
khp=0  hp=0
katk=0  atk=0
minatk=0
minhp=0
lvltower =0
debaff=0
pogoda =0
unatklvl=1
unhplvl=1
Vil=0
Ard =0
Dreid=0
Kort=0
Kail=0
Ouen=0
debaff=0
hpdabl=0
atkdabl=0
end

function lua_do()
myField = native.newTextField(canvas.width / 6,canvas.height *1.4, canvas.width / 5, canvas.height / 7)
canvasGroup:insert(myField)
myField.inputType = "number"
myField.placeholder ="➷"
myField.text=katk
end

function lua_do()
myFieldd = native.newTextField(canvas.width /2.6, canvas.height *1.4, canvas.width / 5, canvas.height / 7)
canvasGroup:insert(myFieldd)
myFieldd.inputType = "number"
myFieldd.placeholder ="♡"
myFieldd.text=khp
end

function lua_do()
myFielddd = native.newTextField(canvas.width / 1.63, canvas.height *1.4, canvas.width /5, canvas.height / 7)
canvasGroup:insert(myFielddd)
myFielddd.inputType = "number"
myFielddd.placeholder ="%"
myFielddd.text=debaff
end

function lua_do()
myFielddddd = native.newTextField(canvas.width / 1.2, canvas.height *1.4, canvas.width /5, canvas.height / 7)
canvasGroup:insert(myFielddddd)
myFielddddd.inputType = "number"
myFielddddd.placeholder = "★"
end

function lua_do()
myFieldddd = native.newTextBox(canvas.width / 1.9,canvas.height / 1.4, canvas.width / 1.2, canvas.height / 1)
canvasGroup:insert(myFieldddd)
myFieldddd.esEditable=false
myFieldddd.align="center"
myFieldddd.size=86
myFieldddd.hasBackground=false
myFieldddd.inputType = "number"
myFieldddd.placeholder = ""
myFieldddd.text= "[➷]".. katk.. "/[♡]".. khp.. "<s>
".."<s>
".. "[➹]".. math.round(atk).. "/[♡]".. math.round(hp) 
end

function lua_do()
khp=0  hp=0
katk=0  atk=0
unatklvl=1
unhplvl=1
Vil=0
Ard =0
Dreid=0
Kort=0
Kail=0
Ouen=0
minatk=0
minhp=0
lvltower=0
end

function lua_do()
if Vil == 1 then vhp=10 vatk=5 else vhp=0 vatk=0 end
if Dreid== 1 then dhp=20 datk=5 else dhp=0 datk=0 end
if Kort == 1 then kohp=25 koatk=20 else kohp=0 koatk=0 end
if Ouen== 1 then ohp=35 oatk=15 else ohp=0 oatk=0 end
if Ard== 1 then ardhp=30 ardatk=10 else ardhp=0 ardatk=0 end
if Kail== 1 then Klhp=70 Klatk=35 else Klhp=0 Klatk=0 end
minhp=6<plus>unhplvl<plus>vhp<plus>dhp<plus>kohp<plus>ohp<plus>ardhp<plus>Klhp
minatk=6<plus>unatklvl<plus>vatk<plus>datk<plus>koatk<plus>oatk<plus>ardatk<plus>Klatk 
end

function lua_do()
katk= myField.text
display.remove(myField)
khp=myFieldd.text
display.remove(myFieldd)
debaff= tonumber(myFielddd.text) 
display.remove(myFielddd)
atkk = 20*lvltower
atkkk = 8*lvltower
atkkkk = atkk<plus> atkkk 
atk= khp - atkkkk
hpp = khp/100
hppp = 28 * lvltower
hpppp = math.floor (hppp/hpp) 
hppppp = hpppp/100
hpppppp = math.round(katk*hppppp) 
hp = katk - hpppppp 

atkkdabl=(minhp-5) /myField.text
atkkkdabl=math.round(myFieldd.text*atkkdabl) 
atkkkkdabl=math.round(myFieldd.text-atkkkdabl) 
atkdabl=math.round(atkkkkdabl-hppp) 
hpdabl=hp



if pogoda==1 
then
if debaff==30 then hp=hp * 1.45 end
if debaff==35 then hp=hp * 1.55 end
if debaff==40 then hp=hp * 1.70 end
if debaff==45 then hp=hp * 1.90 end
if debaff==50 then hp=hp * 2 end
end

if pogoda==2
then
if debaff==30 then atk=atk * 1.45 end
if debaff==35 then atk=atk * 1.55 end
if debaff==40 then atk=atk * 1.70 end
if debaff==45 then atk=atk * 1.90 end
if debaff==50 then atk=atk * 2 end


end
pogoda=0

end

function lua_do()
katk= myField.text
display.remove(myField)
khp= myFieldd.text
display.remove(myFieldd)
debaff= tonumber(myFielddd.text) 
display.remove(myFielddd)
atkk = 20*lvltower
atkkk = 8*lvltower
atkkkk = atkk
atk= khp - atkkkk
hpp = khp/100
hppp = 20 * lvltower
hpppp = math.floor (hppp/hpp) 
hppppp = hpppp/100
hpppppp = math.round(katk*hppppp) 
hp = katk - hpppppp 

atkkdabl=(minhp-5) /myField.text
atkkkdabl=math.round(myFieldd.text*atkkdabl) 
atkkkkdabl=math.round(myFieldd.text-atkkkdabl) 
atkdabl=math.round(atkkkkdabl-hppp) 
hpdabl=hp

if pogoda==1 
then
if debaff==30 then hp=hp * 1.45 end
if debaff==35 then hp=hp * 1.55 end
if debaff==40 then hp=hp * 1.70 end
if debaff==45 then hp=hp * 1.90 end
if debaff==50 then hp=hp * 2 end
end

if pogoda==2
then
if debaff==30 then atk=atk * 1.45 end
if debaff==35 then atk=atk * 1.55 end
if debaff==40 then atk=atk * 1.70 end
if debaff==45 then atk=atk * 1.90 end
if debaff==50 then atk=atk * 2 end

end
pogoda=0

end

function lua_do()
lvltower=lvltower<plus>1
if lvltower==6 then lvltower=1 end
end

function lua_do()
pogoda = pogoda <plus>1
if pogoda == 3 then pogoda =0 end
end
answers.lua_text:
function lua_text()
if pogoda == 0 then
return "Ясно ❃"
end
if pogoda == 1 then
return "Ураган ※"
end
if pogoda == 2 then
return "Дождь ❖"
end 
end

function lua_do()
if myFielddddd.text ~= "" and myFielddddd ~= nil then 
unatklvl=myFielddddd.text
display.remove(myFielddddd) 
else unatklvl=unatklvl
end
end

function lua_do()
if myFielddddd.text ~= "" and myFielddddd ~= nil then 
unhplvl=myFielddddd.text
display.remove(myFielddddd) 
else unhplvl=unhplvl
end
end
